::Havotron/Darkwing/Dreadwind/Needlenose/Scrapper::
Havotron turned these few recent events over in his head.  The 
Autobots preparing to leave, his chance to take over Megatrons 
command, his turn to RULE!
"I will need more Decepticons if I wish to defeat these Autobots, and 
uhhhuhhh Megatron. I despise that name. He is so weak yet he lived in 
command for so many years.  But his time has come. Ha ha hahahahhaha 
(damn almost a sinister laugh)" 

He opened a comlink to Dreadwind and Darkwing.  
"Dreadwind Darkwing, combine and find the constructicons. They may be 
useful to our cause. And hurry!"

Dreadwind groaned as he walked out of the CR to meet his brother. He 
hated combining with him.  Darkwing rounded a corner and bumped into 
him.  He also did not enjoy being united with his brother. They 
looked at each other with annoyance and hate in thier optics.  Then 
jumpimg in the air combined creating Dreadwing. The supersonic jet 
roared through the base and out flying to the fortress made by the 
Constructicons.  

Needlenose watching from afar saw the jet fly out. Turning to his 
Nebulan companions said. "Hmm, I guess the Decepticons think we are 
still unuseful huh, ZigZag?"
The nebulan replied to him in an uproar. 
"Nobody calls me unuseful.  I am not a nobody.  I am needed. I am 
needed for....for....well it doesn't matter but lets show them just 
how needed we are. How bout it Sunstreak?

The other Nebulan turned,
"Dude, if this means i can ride some Cybertronion waves later, I am 
all for it."

Needlenose grinned. "Yes ....LETS!" he screamed transforming to jet 
mode and ZigZag and sunstreak transforming to thier weapon modes and 
attaching to Needlenose.  They flew at the D.E.D base on Cybertron 
and fired a missile at the door. Then stood and waited for someone to 
come out.

Havotron felt the base shake and a loud boom.  He opened a comm link 
to all D.E.D in the meeting hall.  "What was that.  Soundwave, 
communicate the others and meet me outside." . He then walked slowly 
for the base door.

Scrapper looked out upon the vasses of scrap objects laying around 
thier nicely built fort.  Turning to the other Contructicons said
"There is a jet appraching fast, maybe Megatron wants us back!"
